descriptions.description: SQLite is a software library that implements a self-contained, serverless, zero-configuration, transactional SQL database engine. SQLite is the most widely deployed SQL database engine in the world. The source code for SQLite is in the public domain.

set.commands: PACKAGE_NAME=sqlite PACKAGE_VERSION=3.8.0.2 oegcleanbase oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz #oegimport libiconv-1.14 #oegimport gettext-0.18.3 configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
